Exaggerate: The claim exaggerates the idea that the transportation budget and Ohio Turnpike plan will result in lower tolls than ever before in the history of the turnpike.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks sufficient evidence or support to back up the assertion that tolls will be lower than ever before.
Falters at times: The claim falters in its accuracy and consistency, as it contradicts the fact that tolls are actually set to increase for at least 10 years.
Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that the plan calls for tolls to increase for a significant period of time.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that the transportation budget and Ohio Turnpike plan will automatically result in lower tolls, without considering other factors or potential alternative explanations.
